A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a grat addition to the Star Wars universe\, with new worlds and amazing\, jaw dropping suprises that will leave any fan shocked. Johnson is able to make it seem like Empire Strikes Back \, but also adds a lot more to the store to make its own thing. Great endings for well-known characters and starts for others. Mark Hamill surprises all with his best performance yet.
